description: A document of some sort (PDF, TIFF, HTML) associated with a filing

uid.description: Unique id/reference for the filing if it has one

language.description: Language of the filing if known. Should be represented as two-letter ISO-639 code

:original_source_url.description: Persistent URL for the document, if there is one

source_url.description: Source url of the web page for the filing or if there is not persistent URL the page from which it can be found (e.g. search page). This field is required.

source_location.description: If the accounts filing has been put on sources.opencorporates.com the path to the filing
